survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Plant Care Subscription Services
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers who have used plant care subscription services to understand their satisfaction levels, identify areas for improvement, and enhance service offerings.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your plant care subscription service overall?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your plant care subscription service overall?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: Which of the following features do you value most in your plant care subscription service? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture diverse preferences. Include an 'Other' option for additional feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE). Include an open-text field for 'Other' if selected.

script.question_text: Which of the following features do you value most in your plant care subscription service? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend our plant care subscription service to a friend or colleague?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure likelihood of recommendation. This is a key metric for Net Promoter Score (NPS).

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend our plant care subscription service to a friend or colleague?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for our plant care subscription service?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Encourage detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for our plant care subscription service?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: How often do you interact with the plant care subscription service (e.g., app, website, customer support)?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Measure engagement frequency to assess service usage patterns.
